name: Cyberdimensional
description:
Cyberdimensional is a First Person Shooter, Tower Defense game in 8 bit cyberspace!

You are a 3 dimensional being against 2D invaders, build your defenses and protect your core. Or dive into the plane rift and join the battle!

Arm yourself with many different weapons and defenses to fight through the waves of the Red Invaders.

This game is currently on early access, more content will be coming soon.
